learning_objective: Seek diverse perspectives for the purpose of improving computational artifacts.
question_str:
{
    "Question": "Alex is designing a web-based app for calculating the area and perimeter of different plane figures. However, Alex noticed that the tool was not as intuitive and user-friendly as they wanted. Alex decided to seek some diverse perspectives to improve it. Who amongst the following can Alex NOT seek advice from for this purpose?",
    "Answer1": "Taylor, a blind user to understand how the app interface can be more accessible.",
    "Answer2": "Jordan, a middle school math teacher to understand what would make the tool more useful for teaching plane figures.",
    "Answer3": "Bailey, a UX/UI designer to understand how the tool interface could be more intuitive.",
    "Answer4": "Cameron, a car mechanic who doesn’t know much about plane figures and currently has no use for the app.",
    "CorrectAnswer": "4",
    "Explanation": "Cameron, being a car mechanic, and having little to no knowledge or use for a tool that calculates the area and perimeter of plane figures, may not be able to provide feedback that will be beneficial for improving the computational artifact."
}
